scrape.title: The dinner
scrape.author: Isabelle
scrape.text: I had not read a bad book in a long while so I guess it was bound to happen sooner or later. The first thing I noticed was the way it was written. It felt very awkward. I can't help but wonder if the person who translated the book from Dutch did a really crappy job or if the author is to blame. The characters (all of them) are absolutely detestable. The story is boring, I found myself skipping whole paragraphs which is something I usually never do. All in all, it was just a bad read.
